items.summary: Generate the Rajat's Equation logo image from the uploaded file (rajat's eqn logo -1.jpeg) and save it to frontend/public/assets/generated/ as a static asset with appropriate dimensions for Hero section display (approximately 200-250px wide for desktop, responsive scaling for mobile)

Update the Hero component (frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx) to display the generated Rajat's Equation logo image at the top of the Hero section, positioned prominently above or alongside the headline, with proper sizing (200-250px wide on desktop) and responsive behavior for mobile devices
